#  Gamepad Vendor&dollar;
<!--
@name:  Gamepad Vendor&dollar;
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

 Return the vendor code for the specified gamepad
## Parameters

- **GAMEPAD**: The number of the specified gamepad
